oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leveraging social media for small ruminant practices
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Miller, Blake H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: social media
reviews
small ruminants
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fortunately or unfortunately, having a presence on Facebook, Instagram, Google, and other social media outlets has become the most common way for clients to discover their local veterinarian. Because of this, it is important to be able to be able to engage the customer through creating online business profiles on social media, posting on social media outlets, curating positive reviews, and responding to positive and negative reviews.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2020; 267
